Enarx_Description: Interacts with Enarx. Type `/enarx help` for more info
Enarx_Bot_Username_Description: The username who'll send the messages
Enarx_Members_Room_Name_Description: The room name for Enarx to get members from
Enarx_Post_Checkin_Room_Name_Description: The room name for Enarx to post checkins to
Enarx_Post_Answers_Room_Name_Description: The room name for Enarx to post answers to
